Radius.description: The radius of the volume for the pole.

Height.description: The height of the volume for the pole

Power.description: The force the player is launched with.

Pitch.description: The height angle that the player is launched at.

Yaw.description: The direction on the X axis that the player is launched at, from the centre of the pole.

RotationTime.description: How long it takes to do one loop of the pole.

OutOfControl.description: How long it should take after being launched for the player to be able to move again.
